بوٹسوانا ہیرے بنانے والا ملک ہے۔

Is Botswana a diamond-producing country? Botswana diamond production
Botswana is the leading diamond-producing country in terms of value, and the second largest in terms of volume. This is the home base of De Beers, and the source of most of its production today.
Is Botswana a diamond-producing country? Botswana diamond production
As of 2023, Botswana is the world's largest producer of diamonds by value and second largest producer of diamonds by volume. Some of the world's largest diamonds have been found here.
